resources.string: Main menu, with navigation leading to its intents. If clicking on any of TextViews it will open their intents. Also, there is Now Playing shortcut, that if click on this card widget view, it will open Now Playing intent. At the moment to go back from any other intent to the mainLayout, you can do by pressing back button on the phone, but in the future, I would add an option in layout, right beside the label that will allow user to go back from other intents to main one. Also, I would like to add a search icon at the top, right side of the labels (every intent, except Now Playing), which would expand and would allow to search for music, album, artist or song name in library.

In this layout will be displayed all artists, which are stored on the device library. All artists would be displayed in RecycleView vertically and when clicked on artist name it would lead to Now Playing intent.

Playlists Intent. This would be a scrollable intent with option to create your own playlists. I would put here card widget, where music would be stored and would go to Now Playing intent when clicked on chosen card widget. Each cardView will have image and name of the playlist. This layout will be LinearLayout with rectangular cardViews which have set sizes. I would add an icon on top-right-side of the intent for an option to create a new playlist

I would use here RecyclerView to display all songs from library alphabetically. They would be displayed in LinearLayout in orientation vertical. Every song on right side end would have an icon play button, which would lead to Now Playing intent when clicked on.
Albums Intent will display all albums alphabetically and same as songs and artists intents with RecyclerView and LinearLayout vertically.

Genres intent. In this intent would be displayed different genres, like Indie, Pop, Rock, etc. in CardView widgets, which would be displayed in LinearLayout vertically, and layout matched to parent (similarly to main menu). Every genre card would contain song list by its genre. There could be an option play all with icon on the card.

Now Playing intent will show the picture of the artists/album, artists name and songs name, and other components what is needed for player using a MediaPlayer API. Also there is list at the bottom, which scrolls down and there is songs displayed. Ideally would use a RecyclerView for it and add an additional buttons to play that record on the right side of the view.
